example.question: Two students each carry a box up to the third floor of a building. The total mass of each student and the box she is carrying is the same. Roberta makes the trip in 45 s while Mary takes 30 s. Which of the following statements best describes this task?

text: Roberta does more total work than Mary.
Mary does more total work than Roberta.
Roberta has a greater power output than Mary.
Mary has a greater power output than Roberta.

prompt:
Accurately answer the following question:

Two students each carry a box up to the third floor of a building. The total mass of each student and the box she is carrying is the same. Roberta makes the trip in 45 s while Mary takes 30 s. Which of the following statements best describes this task?

Choices:
A. Roberta does more total work than Mary.
B. Mary does more total work than Roberta.
C. Roberta has a greater power output than Mary.
D. Mary has a greater power output than Roberta.


Instructions:
- Carefully read the question and all options.
- Select the single most correct answer.
- Respond ONLY in the following format: "The correct answer is A/B/C/D".
- Do not include any explanations, additional text, or punctuation besides the answer.
